Package arez.spy

@OmitPattern(unless="arez.enable_spies") package arez.spy
Spy events and introspection utilities. The arez package and this package are highly inter-dependent but they are kept separated as production builds typically compile out everything in this package when spies are disabled.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    arez
    Core Arez primitives.
